content: Wrath of the Lich King (2008) takes players to Northrend to face Arthas Menethil, the Lich King.
It introduced the first hero class: Death Knight, starting at level 55 with a unique storyline.
The expansionâ€™s central theme is undeath and the corruption of power.
Major raids include Naxxramas (reimagined), Ulduar, Trial of the Crusader, and Icecrown Citadel.
Players experienced new zones like Borean Tundra, Howling Fjord, and Icecrown.
Professions gained the new Inscription skill for creating glyphs and scrolls.
During early alpha, there was a scrapped zone called 'The Frozen Library' beneath Icecrown Citadel. (EASTER_EGG)
